citation.abstract: Rhino horn trade is a hotly contested topic. Proponents believe it can aid conservation efforts. But those in opposition believe it will cause poaching to increase.

news.title: To save our rhinos, we need a legal horn trade
news.summary: Swaziland's proposal says income from a legal, non-lethal trade in rhino horn would greatly ease financial pressure at a time when its rhino parks are struggling with surging rhino protection costs, and help drive out the illegal trade.
